table.name: com.bos.dataset.biz.TbBizAmapveeConstructionDtl
table.displayName: 43-基本建设贷款明细额度批复
table.sql: select * from tb_biz_peers_apply t,tb_biz_peers_amount_approve ta,TB_BIZ_PEERS_AMOUNT_APVDTL tb,tb_biz_amapvee_construction_dtl tc where t.APPLY_ID=ta.APPLY_ID and ta.amount_id = tb.amount_id and tb.approve_detail_id = tc.approve_detail_id and t.BIZ_NUM=#bizNum#
